title: Hacked pls help
body: I still have access to the account through my phone but the email and password have been changed but not the summoner name. All the friends have been deleted off. I’ve submitted a ticket but nothing so far. I even have proof that the account is mine. I have over 1500 hours I the game and countless skins. Pls help

replies.body: If you've already got a ticket submitted then you're in the right place! Those recovery agents will be able to verify you as the creator with a few questions regarding activity on the account, and after they'll help you get back in and correct any damage the hacker might have done.
Thank you, I signed into my second account since I can’t access the other now, literally happened yesterday some time. I just hope it’s soon. Know how long tickets usually take to get addressed?

Really just depends on the current amount of tickets in their queue, but the average tends to be around 12 hours (I know I know it sounds like a lot, but we've got a pretty large user base here in NA as you can imagine)

Yea, I’m well aware, I’ll give it a few more days. Hopefully it won’t actually take that long. I dunno if the ticket I’ve submited will be addressed at the “my tickets section” or the email I used to get the confirmation for the ticket being submitted.
It’s this wulfjob account, I’m using my phone because it has automatic access somehow
